name: Pre-Game Paella
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: Chicken, kielbasa and shrimp are mixed with a bold combination of Swanson® Chicken Stock, rice, turmeric and salsa to make a colorful dish that's a real crowd pleaser.
ingredients: 2 cups uncooked regular long-grain white rice
12 ounces frozen peeled and deveined small cooked shrimp, thawed
1 (10 ounce) package refrigerated fully-cooked chicken breast strips
directions: Heat the oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium heat
Add the rice and cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly
Stir in the stock, salsa and turmeric and heat to a boil
Cover the skillet and cook for 15 minutes
Stir in the kielbasa, shrimp and chicken
Cover the skillet and cook for 5 minutes or until the rice is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed
